title: Minotaur
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

- *This page is about the player [species](/Species "Species"). For the monster, see [Minotaur (monster)](/Minotaur_\(monster\) "Minotaur (monster)").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The Minotaurs are a species of hybrids, posessing human bodies with bovine heads. They delve into the Dungeon because of their instinctive love of twisting passageways.Minotaurs are extremely good at all forms of physical combat, but are awful at using any type of magic. They can wear all armour except for some headgear. When in close combat, Minotaurs are able to reflexively headbutt those who dare attack them. |

## Contents

- [1 Innate Abilities](#Innate_Abilities)
- [2 Preferred Backgrounds](#Preferred_Backgrounds)
- [3 Level Bonuses](#Level_Bonuses)
- [4 Starting Skills and Equipment](#Starting_Skills_and_Equipment)
- [5 Difficulty of Play](#Difficulty_of_Play)
- [6 Skill aptitudes](#Skill_aptitudes)
- [7 History](#History)

## Innate Abilities

- **[Horns](/Horns "Horns") 2**: Minotaurs get a secondary melee attack from their horns, but cannot wear [helmets](/Helmet "Helmet").
- Minotaurs instinctively counterattack foes in melee with a [headbutt](/Auxiliary_attack "Auxiliary attack") with an `XL + 22.5`% chance. This equates to roughly 25% at XL2 and 50% at XL27.

Minotaurs have a base [Strength](/Strength "Strength") of 12, [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence") of 5 and [Dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") of 5 (before Background modifiers). They have -1 to their base [magic points](/Magic_points "Magic points").

## Preferred Backgrounds

- **Warriors:** [Fighter](/Fighter "Fighter"), [Gladiator](/Gladiator "Gladiator"), [Monk](/Monk "Monk"), [Hunter](/Hunter "Hunter")
- **Zealots:** [Berserker](/Berserker "Berserker")

## Level Bonuses

- +1 [strength](/Strength "Strength") or [dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") (equal chance) every 4th level.
- 10% more [HP](/HP "HP") than average.
- +3 [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") per level.

## Starting Skills and Equipment

Minotaurs start with the skills and equipment listed for their background, with these exceptions:

- Any [helmet](/Helmet "Helmet") is replaced with a [hat](/Hat "Hat").

## Difficulty of Play

|                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Simple](/Category:Easy_species "Category:Easy species")** • [Intermediate](/Category:Moderate_species "Category:Moderate species") • [Advanced](/Category:Hard_species "Category:Hard species") |

Minotaurs are incredible at physical (melee & ranged) combat. They have a wide assortment of strengths: their actual strength, skill aptitudes, their HP, and automatic Horn attacks. Combined, they make the Minotaur one of the strongest and most durable species in the game, without the armour restrictions or skill deficiencies of a [Troll](/Troll "Troll") or [Oni](/Oni "Oni").

The Minotaur playstyle fits right at home with [Trog](/Trog "Trog") or [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru") as their [god](/God "God"), simple but strong god choices. However, they are by no means limited to just those two. Picking any of their recommended backgrounds will make use of all of the Minotaur's strengths.

## Skill aptitudes

The higher the value, the better the aptitude.

|                [Skill](/Skill "Skill")               | [Aptitude](/Aptitude "Aptitude") |             [Skill](/Skill "Skill")             | [Aptitude](/Aptitude "Aptitude") | [Skill](/Skill "Skill")                            | [Aptitude](/Aptitude "Aptitude") |
| :--------------------------------------------------: | :------------------------------: | :---------------------------------------------: | -------------------------------: | -------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------: |
|                     ***Attack***                     |                                  |               ***Miscellaneous***               |                                  | ***Magic***                                        |                                  |
|           [Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting")           |                 2                |            [Armour](/Armour "Armour")           |                                2 | [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting")       |                               -4 |
|                                                      |                                  |          [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging")          |                                1 |                                                    |                                  |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") |                 2                | [Shields](/Shields_\(skill\) "Shields (skill)") |                                2 | [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")       |                               -3 |
|                 [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                 |                 2                | [Stealth](/Stealth_\(skill\) "Stealth (skill)") |                               -1 | [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")                            |                               -4 |
|           [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")           |                 2                |                                                 |                                  | [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings")             |                               -3 |
|              [Staves](/Staves "Staves")              |                 2                |    [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations")    |                                0 | [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")             |                               -3 |
|  [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat")  |                 1                |      [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations")     |                               -1 | [Translocations](/Translocations "Translocations") |                               -3 |
|           [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")           |                 0                | [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting") |                               -3 | [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy")                      |                               -3 |
|                                                      |                                  |                                                 |                                  | [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic")             |                               -3 |
|     [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")     |                 1                |                                                 |                                  | [Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")                |                               -3 |
|       [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")      |                 2                |                                                 |                                  | [Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")                |                               -3 |
|  [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")  |                 1                |      [Experience](/Experience "Experience")     |                               -1 | [Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic")          |                               -2 |

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), retaliation headbutt attacks occurred when passing `5 * STR + 7 * DEX > 1d(600)` (as opposed to the current, XL-based check).
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), headbutt auxiliary attacks would apply a small stun.
- Prior to [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), Minotaurs had slightly different aptitudes.

| [Species](/Species "Species") |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ----------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Simple                        | [Mountain Dwarf](/Mountain_Dwarf "Mountain Dwarf") • [Minotaur]() • [Merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk") • [Gargoyle](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") • [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") • [Troll](/Troll "Troll") • [Deep Elf](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf") • [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur") • [Gnoll](/Gnoll "Gnoll") |
| Intermediate                  | [Human](/Human "Human") • [Kobold](/Kobold "Kobold") • [Demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") • [Djinni](/Djinni "Djinni") • [Spriggan](/Spriggan "Spriggan") • [Ghoul](/Ghoul "Ghoul") • [Tengu](/Tengu "Tengu") • [Oni](/Oni "Oni") • [Barachi](/Barachi "Barachi")                                |
| Advanced                      | [Coglin](/Coglin "Coglin") • [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") • [Vampire](/Vampire "Vampire") • [Demigod](/Demigod "Demigod") • [Formicid](/Formicid "Formicid") • [Naga](/Naga "Naga") • [Octopode](/Octopode "Octopode") • [Felid](/Felid "Felid") • [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy")           |
html:
Minotaur

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
This page is about the player species. For the monster, see Minotaur (monster).
The Minotaurs are a species of hybrids, posessing human bodies with bovine heads. They delve into the Dungeon because of their instinctive love of twisting passageways.

Minotaurs are extremely good at all forms of physical combat, but are awful at using any type of magic. They can wear all armour except for some headgear. When in close combat, Minotaurs are able to reflexively headbutt those who dare attack them.

Contents

  • 1 Innate Abilities
  • 2 Preferred Backgrounds
  • 3 Level Bonuses
  • 4 Starting Skills and Equipment
  • 5 Difficulty of Play
  • 6 Skill aptitudes
  • 7 History

Innate Abilities

  • Horns 2: Minotaurs get a secondary melee attack from their horns, but cannot wear helmets.
  • Minotaurs instinctively counterattack foes in melee with a headbutt with an XL + 22.5% chance. This equates to roughly 25% at XL2 and 50% at XL27.

Minotaurs have a base Strength of 12, Intelligence of 5 and Dexterity of 5 (before Background modifiers). They have -1 to their base magic points.

Preferred Backgrounds

  • Warriors: Fighter, Gladiator, Monk, Hunter
  • Zealots: Berserker

Level Bonuses

  • +1 strength or dexterity (equal chance) every 4th level.
  • 10% more HP than average.
  • +3 willpower per level.

Starting Skills and Equipment

Minotaurs start with the skills and equipment listed for their background, with these exceptions:

  • Any helmet is replaced with a hat.

Difficulty of Play

Simple • Intermediate • Advanced

Minotaurs are incredible at physical (melee & ranged) combat. They have a wide assortment of strengths: their actual strength, skill aptitudes, their HP, and automatic Horn attacks. Combined, they make the Minotaur one of the strongest and most durable species in the game, without the armour restrictions or skill deficiencies of a Troll or Oni.

The Minotaur playstyle fits right at home with Trog or Okawaru as their god, simple but strong god choices. However, they are by no means limited to just those two. Picking any of their recommended backgrounds will make use of all of the Minotaur's strengths.

Skill aptitudes

The higher the value, the better the aptitude.

Skill Aptitude Skill Aptitude Skill Aptitude
Attack Miscellaneous Magic
Fighting 2 Armour 2 Spellcasting -4
Dodging 1
Maces & Flails 2 Shields 2 Conjurations -3
Axes 2 Stealth -1 Hexes -4
Polearms 2 Summonings -3
Staves 2 Invocations 0 Necromancy -3
Unarmed Combat 1 Evocations -1 Translocations -3
Throwing 0 Shapeshifting -3 Alchemy -3
Fire Magic -3
Short Blades 1 Ice Magic -3
Long Blades 2 Air Magic -3
Ranged Weapons 1 Experience -1 Earth Magic -2

History

  • Prior to 0.28, retaliation headbutt attacks occurred when passing 5 * STR + 7 * DEX > 1d(600) (as opposed to the current, XL-based check).
  • Prior to 0.17, headbutt auxiliary attacks would apply a small stun.
  • Prior to 0.10, Minotaurs had slightly different aptitudes.
Species
Simple Mountain Dwarf • Minotaur • Merfolk • Gargoyle • Draconian • Troll • Deep Elf • Armataur • Gnoll
Intermediate Human • Kobold • Demonspawn • Djinni • Spriggan • Ghoul • Tengu • Oni • Barachi
Advanced Coglin • Vine Stalker • Vampire • Demigod • Formicid • Naga • Octopode • Felid • Mummy
